name: Farah Shamout
content: Clinical AI Lab About us Primarily based at the NYU Abu Dhabi campus, the Clinical Artificial Intelligence Lab is a hub at New York University for state-of-the-art machine learning research that tackles real-world clinical problems. The group is led by the Principal Investigator Dr. Farah Shamout. Our long-term goal is to improve health outcomes by designing and developing smart diagnostic and prognostic systems. Our research interests cut across multiple disciplines, namely health, engineering, & computing. Featured work MLHC 2022 Nature Communications NPJ Digital Medicine Get to know us! Meet the team NYU Abu Dhabi Stay tuned
